## ðŸŽ“ Key Takeaway

**Small, well-defined stories with clear acceptance criteria enable exceptional 
velocity and quality. Pre-sprint verification prevents planning confusion.**

Sprint 2 demonstrated that when stories are:
- Properly scoped (1-3 pts)
- Clearly defined (specific acceptance criteria)
- User-focused (addressing real feedback)

...the team can deliver high-quality results efficiently.

However, backlog hygiene and pre-sprint verification are critical to ensure 
sprint metrics accurately reflect actual work.
